item.title: Seth Meyers Jokes He’s ‘Always Admired’ Trump After Kimmel Suspension, Promises ‘We’re Gonna Keep Doing Our Show the Way We’ve Always Done It’
item.description: On Thursday’s episode of “Late Night,” Seth Meyers sarcastically pretended to seek approval from Donald Trump in response to the news that ABC pulled “Jimmy Kimmel Live”

item.title: Seth Meyers Jokes He’s ‘Always Admired’ Trump After Kimmel Suspension, Promises ‘We’re Gonna Keep Doing Our Show the Way We’ve Always Done It’
item.description: On Thursday’s episode of “Late Night,” Seth Meyers sarcastically pretended to seek approval from Donald Trump in response to the news that ABC pulled “Jimmy Kimmel Live”

item.title: Greg Gutfeld Rips Jimmy Kimmel: “The Guy Who Shot Charlie Kirk Was Likely a Fan of Yours”
item.description: The Fox News personality laid into his fellow talk-show host amid ABC pulling Kimmel’s late-night show over comments about Charlie Kirk’s shooter.

item.title: Greg Gutfeld Rips Jimmy Kimmel: “The Guy Who Shot Charlie Kirk Was Likely a Fan of Yours”
